summary: **Captain America: The Winter Soldier** is a 2014 superhero movie about Marvel's Captain America. It's the ninth film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Captain America, played by Chris Evans, teams up with Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Falcon (Anthony Mackie) to stop a secret plan inside the spy group S.H.I.E.L.D. They also fight a dangerous killer called the Winter Soldier. The movie is like a mystery adventure, inspired by old conspiracy stories. It was well-liked by critics and made lots of money. A sequel, **Captain America: Civil War**, came out in 2016.
title: Captain America The Winter Soldier
